description: Returns status information for each of your Config managed rules. The status includes information such as the last time Config invoked the rule, the last time Config failed to invoke the rule, and the related error for the last failure.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleNames
parameters.description: The name of the Config managed rules for which you want status information. If you do not specify any names, Config returns status information for all Config managed rules that you use. (string) ---

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The number of rule evaluation results that you want returned. This parameter is required if the rule limit for your account is more than the default of 1000 rules. For information about requesting a rule limit increase, see Config Limits in the Amazon Web Services General Reference Guide.

nested_items.name: ConfigRulesEvaluationStatus
nested_items.description: Status information about your Config managed rules.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the Config rule.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Config rule.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Config rule.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulInvocationTime
nested_items.description: The time that Config last successfully invoked the Config rule to evaluate your Amazon Web Services resources.

nested_items.name: LastFailedInvocationTime
nested_items.description: The time that Config last failed to invoke the Config rule to evaluate your Amazon Web Services resources.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulEvaluationTime
nested_items.description: The time that Config last successfully evaluated your Amazon Web Services resources against the rule.

nested_items.name: LastFailedEvaluationTime
nested_items.description: The time that Config last failed to evaluate your Amazon Web Services resources against the rule.

nested_items.name: FirstActivatedTime
nested_items.description: The time that you first activated the Config rule.

nested_items.name: LastDeactivatedTime
nested_items.description: The time that you last turned off the Config rule.

nested_items.name: LastErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code that Config returned when the rule last failed.

nested_items.name: LastErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message that Config returned when the rule last failed.

nested_items.name: FirstEvaluationStarted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether Config has evaluated your resources against the rule at least once.
true - Config has evaluated your Amazon Web Services resources against the rule at least once.
false - Config has not finished evaluating your Amazon Web Services resources against the rule at least once.

nested_items.name: LastDebugLogDeliveryStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the last attempted delivery of a debug log for your Config Custom Policy rules. Either Successful or Failed.

nested_items.name: LastDebugLogDeliveryStatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason Config was not able to deliver a debug log. This is for the last failed attempt to retrieve a debug log for your Config Custom Policy rules.

nested_items.name: LastDebugLogDeliveryTime
nested_items.description: The time Config last attempted to deliver a debug log for your Config Custom Policy rules.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The string that you use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
